name: Bad Assembly
description:
Bad Assembly is Nathan Holloway and Jimmy Walker, friends who are leaders in their individual fields.
We're designers, developers, strategists, makers, and specialists.
We are not a full-service, traditional advertising agency. We're a world-class digital product design firm.
We do research, product strategy, user experience, design, branding, technology, optimization, social media: everything needed to create a successful digital product or service.
